projects.name: Pomodoro Clock
projects.description: This is a timer app built with React for use with the pomodoro method with customizable session and break lengths. This project was also built for the freeCodeCamp curriculum

projects.name: Markdown Viewer
projects.description: This is an app built with React for viewing markdown text rendered in HTML that was also built for the freeCodeCamp curriculum.

projects.name: D3 Tree Map
projects.description: This is a tree map data visualization created D3.js showing most the most popular video games by platform.

projects.name: D3 Chloropleth Map
projects.description: This is a chloropleth map visualization built with D3.js showing counties across america by educational attainment.

projects.name: URL Shortener Microservice
projects.description: This project allows you to enter a url and a node express server returns a shortened url, which is logged in a MongoDB database via Mongoose and redirects you to the original URL when re-entered.

projects.name: Exercise Tracker Microservice
projects.description: This project allows you to create a username and log exercises, which the server stores in a MongoDB database via Mongoose and returns to you upon later visits.
